sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些前置词或前置短语都含有"虽然，尽管"之意。
means: despite ： 书面用词，指不受某事或某种原因的阻碍，语气轻于in spite of。
in spite of ： 在这些词中语气最强，可与despite换用，口语或书面语中均可使用。
notwithstanding ： 语气最弱，仅表示一种障碍的存在。

sentence.Network_en: He despised William Pitt, notwithstanding the similar views they both held.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管他和威廉·皮特看法相似，却瞧不起他。

sentence.Network_en: His relations with colleagues, differences of opinion notwithstanding, were unfailingly friendly.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管有意见分歧，他和同事们一直关系融洽。

sentence.Network_en: Notwithstanding some major financial problems, the school has had a successful year.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然有些重大的经费问题，这所学校一年来还是很成功。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... notorious 恶名昭彰 notwithstanding 虽然 nought 无.
以n开头的英语英文单词 ... nottingham 诺丁汉(英国城市) notwithstanding 尽管，虽然 nourish 提供养分，养育.
六级核心高频词汇... ... notorious a. 臭名昭著的 386, notwithstanding prep. 尽管,虽然 387, nourish vt. 提供养分,养育 388.
考研英语大纲全部词组 - 豆丁网 ... despite 后无 ） notwithstanding 虽然, 尽管, 还是 on the spot 当场,在现场.

list.abs: except as otherwise stated in the contract and notwithstanding local practice ., 除非合同中另有规定 , 无论当地惯例如何.

notwithstanding official worries about deflation , Reserve money supply figures reveal that the money stock has already inflated at a noticeably higher rate .尽管官方一直忧虑通货紧缩，但是美联储的货币供应数字显示，货币存量已经在以一个引人注目的高速度膨胀。
this provision is commonly referred to as the " notwithstanding clause " and its use is rare and very politically issue .这项规定通常被人称作“不管条款”，它的适用既罕见，又具有政治敏感性。
foregoing... ... 1. Notwithstanding Foregoing: 尽管有上述情况 2. Notwithstanding the foregoing: 尽管有以上规定.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from not + withstanding, present participle of withstand, on the pattern of Old French non obstant 'not providing an obstacle to'

entry.def: If something is true notwithstanding something else, it is true in spite of that other thing.

example.ex: He despised William Pitt, notwithstanding the similar views they both held.
example.tran: 尽管他和威廉·皮特看法相似，却瞧不起他。

means.word_mean: 1. despite anything to the contrary (usually following a concession);

sentences.sentence: "although I'm a little afraid, however I'd like to try it"
"while we disliked each other, nevertheless we agreed"
"he was a stern yet fair master"
"granted that it is dangerous, all the same I still want to go"

auth_sentence.content: The tour commenced, headaches and backaches notwithstanding.
auth_sentence.res_content: The tour commenced, headaches and backaches notwithstanding.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The tour commenced, headaches and backaches notwithstanding.

auth_sentence.content: Notwithstanding, we reserve the right to cancel this promotion.
auth_sentence.res_content: Notwithstanding, we reserve the right to cancel this promotion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Notwithstanding, we reserve the right to cancel this promotion.

auth_sentence.content: The Jesus story is a compelling story, its incoherence notwithstanding.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Jesus story is a compelling story, its incoherence notwithstanding.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Jesus story is a compelling story, its incoherence notwithstanding.

sentences.en: Notwithstanding the heat of the sun we must go out.
sentences.cn: 尽管烈日当空、气温炎热, 我们还得外出。

sentences.en: He was misunderstood notwithstanding his good intentions.
sentences.cn: 虽然他的意图是好的, 但是仍然被误解了。

sentences.en: He insisted on going to the football match, notwithstanding his doctor's advice to the contrary.
sentences.cn: 他不顾医生的劝阻, 坚持要去看足球比赛。

sentences.en: Thomas Carlyle, notwithstanding his tedious rhetoric, is a master of the sublime in prose style.
sentences.cn: 尽管托马斯·卡莱尔的语言花俏冗长, 但是他仍不失为一位令人崇敬的散文文体大师。

sentences.en: They went ahead, public opposition notwithstanding.
sentences.cn: 尽管公众反对, 他们仍继续干下去。

means.word_mean: 尽管如此; 仍然; 然而

sentences.en: I don't like movies, but I will go with you notwithstanding.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢看电影, 但我仍会陪你去。

jushi.english: He was misunderstood notwithstanding his good intentions.
jushi.chinese: 虽然他的意图是好的,但是仍然被误解了。

jushi.english: He insisted on going to the football match, notwithstanding his doctor's advice to the contrary.
jushi.chinese: 他不顾医生的劝阻,坚持要去看足球比赛。

jushi.english: Thomas Carlyle, notwithstanding his tedious rhetoric, is a master of the sublime in prose style.
jushi.chinese: 尽管托马斯·卡莱尔的语言花俏冗长,但是他仍不失为一位令人崇敬的散文文体大师。
